briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Asacol™ 4.8 g/Day (800 mg Tablets) for the Treatment of Active Ulcerative Colitis
officialTitle: A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Double-Blind Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Asacol™ 4.8 g/Day (800 mg Tablets) for the Treatment of Active Ulcerative Colitis
summary: The primary objective of the study is to determine the efficacy of Asacol™ 4.8 g/day (800 mg tablets) to induce clinical and endoscopic remission after 6 weeks of treatment compared to placebo in subjects with active ulcerative colitis (UC).

primaryOutcome.measure: To Achieve Clinical Remission in Subjects With Active Ulcerative Colitis (UC).
